Package game.gmk

Class GomokuGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.gmk.GomokuGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game<GomokuPlayer,GomokuAction>, Drawable
    public class GomokuGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game<GomokuPlayer,GomokuAction>, Drawable
    Implements the free-style Gomoku game(five in a row).
    See Also:
    Gomoku

      • isValid

        public static final boolean isValid​(int[][] board,
                                    GomokuAction action)
        Returns true, iff the specified action is valid on the specified board. That is not null, the board is empty on the position and the position is in the range of the board.
        Parameters:
        board - check action on
        action - to be checked
        Returns:
        true iff the action is valid

      • isValid

        public static final boolean isValid​(int[][] board,
                                    int i,
                                    int j)
        Returns true, iff an action is valid on the specified board at he specified position. That the board is empty on the position and the position is in the range of the board.
        Parameters:
        board - check action on
        i - row index
        j - column index
        Returns:
        true iff the action is valid
